LPQuery.QueryDescription:
Calculates all ActiveSync requests broken down by user-agent and percentage of each client to the total numbe of requests.
Note: Does not track anonymous requests without credentials
LPQuery.QueryData:
/* ActiveSync Clients by Percentage */ /* Press F6 to chart results */
SELECT TOP 100 EXTRACT_PREFIX(EXTRACT_SUFFIX(cs(user-agent), 0, '('), 0, ')') as Client, MUL(PROPCOUNT(*), 100.0) as [Percent] FROM '[LOGFILEPATH]' WHERE cs-uri-stem LIKE '%/Microsoft-Server-ActiveSync%' GROUP BY Client ORDER BY [Percent] DESC

LPQuery.QueryDescription:
Lists the ActiveSync requests per hour.
Note: Does not track anonymous requests without credentials
LPQuery.QueryData:
/* ActiveSync requests per hour (CSV) */
SELECT TO_STRING(QUANTIZE(TO_LOCALTIME(time), 3600), 'hh:mm:ss') as Hour, Count(*) AS Requests, TO_STRING(Date, 'MM/dd/yyyy') as Date, sc-status As Status INTO '[OUTFILEPATH]\MASRequestsPerHour.csv' FROM '[LOGFILEPATH]' WHERE cs-uri-stem LIKE '%/Microsoft-Server-ActiveSync%' AND cs-username NOT LIKE '%HealthMailbox%' AND cs-username <> '' AND cs-username IS NOT NULL GROUP BY Date, Hour, Status

LPQuery.QueryDescription:
Lists ActiveSync requests per user and sends the output to a CSV file.
Note: Does not track anonymous requests without credentials
LPQuery.QueryData:
/* ActiveSync requests per user, per hour */ /* Press F6 to chart the results */
SELECT cs-username AS UserID, Count(*) AS Requests, TO_STRING(Date, 'MM/dd/yyyy') as Date, cs-method AS Method, cs(user-agent) as Client, sc-status As Status INTO '[OUTFILEPATH]\MASRequestsPerHourUser.CSV' FROM '[LOGFILEPATH]' WHERE cs-uri-stem LIKE '%/Microsoft-Server-ActiveSync%' AND UserID NOT LIKE '%HealthMailbox%' AND UserID <> '' AND UserID IS NOT NULL GROUP BY Date, UserID, Method, Client, Status ORDER by Requests DESC

LPQuery.QueryDescription:
Lists ActiveSync requests per user for the top 10,000 users.
Note: Does not track anonymous requests without credentials
LPQuery.QueryData:
/* ActiveSync requests per user, per hour for the top 10k users */ /* Press F6 to chart the results */
SELECT TOP 10000 cs-username AS UserID, Count(*) AS Requests, TO_STRING(Date, 'MM/dd/yyyy') as Date, cs-method AS Method, cs(user-agent) as Client, sc-status As Status FROM '[LOGFILEPATH]' WHERE cs-uri-stem LIKE '%/Microsoft-Server-ActiveSync%' AND UserID NOT LIKE '%HealthMailbox%' AND UserID <> '' AND UserID IS NOT NULL GROUP BY Date, UserID, Method, Client, Status ORDER by Requests DESC

LPQuery.QueryDescription:
Lists the top ActiveSync clients from highest to lowest request count and sends the result to a CSV file.
Note: Does not track anonymous requests without credentials
LPQuery.QueryData:
/*
ActiveSync requests per user, Per day (CSV)
*/
SELECT cs-username AS UserID, Count(*) AS Requests, TO_STRING(Date, 'MM/dd/yyyy') as Date, cs(user-agent) as Client, sc-status As Status INTO '[OUTFILEPATH]\OWAPerUserPerDay.csv' FROM '[LOGFILEPATH]' WHERE cs-uri-stem LIKE '%/Microsoft-Server-ActiveSync%' AND UserID NOT LIKE '%HealthMailbox%' AND UserID <> '' AND UserID IS NOT NULL GROUP BY Date, UserID, Client, Status ORDER BY Requests DESC

LPQuery.QueryDescription:
Calculates all EWS requests broken down by user-agent and percentage of each client to the total numbe of requests.
Note: Does not track anonymous requests without credentials
LPQuery.QueryData:
/* EWS Clients by Percentage */ /* Press F6 to chart results */
SELECT TOP 100 EXTRACT_PREFIX(EXTRACT_SUFFIX(cs(user-agent), 0, '('), 0, ')') as Client, MUL(PROPCOUNT(*), 100.0) as [Percent] FROM '[LOGFILEPATH]' WHERE cs-uri-stem LIKE '%/ews%' GROUP BY Client ORDER BY [Percent] DESC

LPQuery.QueryDescription:
All Lync requests for GetUserPhoto listed in descending order.
Note: Does not track anonymous requests without credentials
LPQuery.QueryData:
/* Lync Get User Photo calls */
SELECT TOP 10000 cs-username AS UserID, cs(User-Agent) AS Application, cs-uri-stem AS Vdir, c-ip AS CLIENT, cs-method, sc-status, Count(*) FROM '[LOGFILEPATH]' WHERE cs-uri-stem LIKE '%EWS%' AND cs-uri-stem LIKE '%GetUserPhoto%' AND UserID IS NOT NULL GROUP BY UserID, Application, Vdir, Client, cs-method, sc-status ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC

LPQuery.QueryName: EWS_WP: MacMail User Requests by user/request
LPQuery.QueryDescription:
MacMail requests by user and number of requests sorted descending.
Note: Does not track anonymous requests without credentials
LPQuery.QueryData:
/* Mac Mail Clients by number of requests */
SELECT TOP 10000 cs-username AS UserID, Count(*) AS Requests, cs(User-Agent) AS Application, cs-uri-stem AS Vdir, c-ip AS CLIENT, cs-method FROM '[LOGFILEPATH]' WHERE UserID NOT LIKE '%$' AND cs-uri-stem LIKE '%EWS%' AND cs-uri-stem NOT LIKE '%GetUserPhoto%' AND Application LIKE '%Mac%' AND Application NOT LIKE '%Outlook%' GROUP BY UserID, Application, Vdir, Client, cs-method ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC

LPQuery.QueryName: EWS_WP: MacOutlook User Requests by client/request
LPQuery.QueryDescription:
MacOutlook User Requests by client/request from highest to lowest hits.
Note: Does not track anonymous requests without credentials
LPQuery.QueryData: /* MacOutlook User Requests by client/request */ SELECT TOP 10000 cs-username AS UserID, Count(*) As Requests, cs(User-Agent) AS Application, cs-uri-stem AS Vdir, c-ip AS CLIENT, cs-method FROM '[LOGFILEPATH]' WHERE UserID NOT LIKE '%$' AND UserID IS NOT NULL AND cs-uri-stem LIKE '%EWS%' AND Application LIKE '%MacOutlook%' GROUP BY UserID, Application, Vdir, Client, cs-method ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC

LPQuery.QueryName: EWS_WP: Non Outlook or Mac Requests
LPQuery.QueryDescription:
Lists all EWS requests that are not generated by either Outlook or Mac ordered by highest to lowest.
Note: Does not track anonymous requests without credentials.
LPQuery.QueryData:
/* EWS Clients and calls â€“ Other */
SELECT TOP 10000 cs-username AS UserID, Count(*) AS Requests, cs(User-Agent) AS Application, cs-uri-stem AS Vdir, c-ip AS CLIENT, cs-method FROM '[LOGFILEPATH]' WHERE cs-uri-stem LIKE '%EWS%' AND cs-uri-stem NOT LIKE '%GetUserPhoto%' AND Application NOT LIKE '%Mac+OS%' AND Application NOT LIKE '%Outlook%' AND UserID IS NOT NULL GROUP BY UserID, Application, Vdir, Client, cs-method ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC

LPQuery.QueryDescription:
Lists the EWS requests per hour.
Note: Does not track anonymous requests without credentials
LPQuery.QueryData:
/* EWS requests per hour (CSV) */
SELECT TO_STRING(QUANTIZE(TO_LOCALTIME(time), 3600), 'hh:mm:ss') as Hour, Count(*) AS Requests, TO_STRING(Date, 'MM/dd/yyyy') as Date, sc-status As Status INTO '[OUTFILEPATH]\EWSRequestsPerHour.csv' FROM '[LOGFILEPATH]' WHERE cs-uri-stem LIKE '%/ews%' AND cs-username NOT LIKE '%HealthMailbox%' AND cs-username <> '' AND cs-username IS NOT NULL GROUP BY Date, Hour, Status

Lists EWS requests per user for the top 10,000 users.
Note: Does not track anonymous requests without credentials

LPQuery.QueryDescription:
Lists the top EWS clients from highest to lowest request count.
Note: Does not track anonymous requests without credentials
LPQuery.QueryData:
/*
EWS requests per user, Per day (CSV)
*/
SELECT cs-username AS UserID, Count(*) AS Requests, TO_STRING(Date, 'MM/dd/yyyy') as Date, cs(user-agent) as Client, sc-status As Status INTO '[OUTFILEPATH]\EWSPerUserPerDay.csv' FROM '[LOGFILEPATH]' WHERE cs-uri-stem LIKE '%/EWS%' AND UserID NOT LIKE '%HealthMailbox%' AND UserID <> '' AND UserID IS NOT NULL GROUP BY Date, UserID, Client, Status ORDER BY Requests DESC

LPQuery.QueryName: OLA_WP: Errors, per user, per hour, per day
LPQuery.QueryDescription:
Outlook Anywhere users by number of requests.
Note: Does not track anonymous requests without credentials

LPQuery.QueryName: OLA_WP: Errors, per user, per hour, per day (CSV)
LPQuery.QueryDescription:
Outlook Anywhere users by number of requests.
Note: Does not track anonymous requests without credentials

Lists the Outlook Anywhere requests per hour.
Note: Does not track anonymous requests without credentials
LPQuery.QueryData:
/* Outlook Anywhere requests per hour */ /* Use F6 to chart the results */
SELECT TOP 100000 TO_STRING(QUANTIZE(TO_LOCALTIME(time), 3600), 'hh:mm:ss') as Hour, Count(*) AS Requests, TO_STRING(Date, 'MM/dd/yyyy') as Date, sc-status As Status FROM '[LOGFILEPATH]' WHERE cs-uri-stem LIKE '%/RPC%' AND cs-username NOT LIKE '%HealthMailbox%' AND cs-username <> '' AND cs-username IS NOT NULL AND (cs-method = 'RPC_IN_DATA' OR cs-method = 'RPC_OUT_DATA') GROUP BY Date, Hour, Status

LPQuery.QueryDescription:
Lists the Outlook Anywhere requests per hour.
Note: Does not track anonymous requests without credentials
LPQuery.QueryData:
/* Outlook Anywhere requests per hour */
SELECT TO_STRING(QUANTIZE(TO_LOCALTIME(time), 3600), 'hh:mm:ss') as Hour, Count(*) AS Requests, TO_STRING(Date, 'MM/dd/yyyy') as Date, sc-status As Status INTO '[OUTFILEPATH]\OLARequestsPerHour.csv' FROM '[LOGFILEPATH]' WHERE cs-uri-stem LIKE '%/RPC%' AND cs-username NOT LIKE '%HealthMailbox%' AND cs-username <> '' AND cs-username IS NOT NULL AND (cs-method = 'RPC_IN_DATA' OR cs-method = 'RPC_OUT_DATA') GROUP BY Date, Hour, Status

LPQuery.QueryName: OLA_WP: Requests per hour, per user
LPQuery.QueryDescription:
Lists the Outlook Anywhere requests per hour, per user.
Note: Does not track anonymous requests without credentials
LPQuery.QueryData:
/* Outlook Anywhere requests per user, per hour */ /* Use F6 to chart the results */
SELECT TOP 100000 TO_STRING(QUANTIZE(TO_LOCALTIME(time), 3600), 'hh:mm:ss') as Hour, Count(*) AS Requests, TO_STRING(Date, 'MM/dd/yyyy') as Date, cs-username AS UserID, cs(user-agent) as Client, sc-status As Status FROM '[LOGFILEPATH]' WHERE cs-uri-stem LIKE '%/RPC%' AND UserID NOT LIKE '%HealthMailbox%' AND UserID <> '' AND UserID IS NOT NULL AND (cs-method = 'RPC_IN_DATA' OR cs-method = 'RPC_OUT_DATA') GROUP BY Date, Hour, UserID, Client, Status

LPQuery.QueryName: OLA_WP: Requests per hour, per user (CSV)
LPQuery.QueryDescription:
Lists the Outlook Anywhere requests per hour, per user.
Note: Does not track anonymous requests without credentials
LPQuery.QueryData:
/* Outlook Anywhere requests per user, per hour */
SELECT TO_STRING(QUANTIZE(TO_LOCALTIME(time), 3600), 'hh:mm:ss') as Hour, Count(*) AS Requests, TO_STRING(Date, 'MM/dd/yyyy') as Date, cs-username AS UserID, cs(user-agent) as Client, sc-status As Status INTO '[OUTFILEPATH]\OLARequestsPerUserPerHour.csv' FROM '[LOGFILEPATH]' WHERE cs-uri-stem LIKE '%/RPC%' AND UserID NOT LIKE '%HealthMailbox%' AND UserID <> '' AND UserID IS NOT NULL AND (cs-method = 'RPC_IN_DATA' OR cs-method = 'RPC_OUT_DATA') GROUP BY Date, Hour, UserID, Client, Status

Lists Outlook Anywhere requests per user.

LPQuery.QueryDescription:
Lists Outlook Anywhere requests per user.
Note: Does not track anonymous requests without credentials

/* Outlook Anywhere requests per user */ /* Use F6 to chart the results */
SELECT TOP 100000 cs-username AS UserID, Count(*) AS Requests, TO_STRING(Date, 'MM/dd/yyyy') as Date, cs-method AS Method, cs(user-agent) as Client, sc-status As Status FROM '[LOGFILEPATH]' WHERE cs-uri-stem LIKE '%/RPC%' AND UserID NOT LIKE '%HealthMailbox%' AND UserID <> '' AND UserID IS NOT NULL AND (cs-method = 'RPC_IN_DATA' OR cs-method = 'RPC_OUT_DATA') GROUP BY Date, UserID, Method, Client, Status ORDER BY Requests DESC
